name: Trinket
description: Valuable item that you can trade for other items or maybe the potion at the next village

name: Sword
description: Help you fight and defeat enemies you may encounter.

name: Armor
description: Help protect you and keep your health up during the game.

name: Fish
description: Eat the fish to increase your health

name: Bread
description: Eat the bread to increase your health

name: Potion
description: Quickly take the potion back to your home village to save your sister

name: Ale
description: Ale is a unique source of nutrition if you drink the ale it might have benefits but it might impact other areas of your defense.
